page.title: 11Leisure
page.content: As the most central town in the Stewartry, Castle-Douglas has a variety of shops, most of them locally owned and therefore appreciated because of their individuality. At the 'top' of the town is the large Market Hill car park which is adjacent to the library, small swimming pool and art gallery. The amusement arcade is very popular with teenagers with over 50 different games. At the 'foot' of the town is Carlingwark Loch, where boats may be hired and fishing permits obtained. Beside the loch is a recently modernised and attractive caravan park, tennis courts and nearby, a bowling green. The squash courts are very popular and visitors are welcome to have a game. With several hotels, good bed and breakfast accomodation and cafes, Castle Douglas is a deservedly popular holiday resort
